examples: My office is on the fourth floor.
It's the fourth time that I've been to America.
Her mother had just given birth to another child, her fourth.
He finished fourth in the race.

meanings.def: one of four equal parts of something
examples: a fourth of the city population
The film cuts back and forth between the two stories.
The fourth of July is Independence Day in the US.
A fourth of the ski resorts in the Alps may not have enough snow this year.
